title: haptic_game_integration
description: Defines how and where haptic inputs are coming from in a game.

identification.description: A group of defining features that are used to load configurations when an avatar is detected

author_name.description: The name of the author of the map, all map names must be unique for a author. Please use a screen name

map_name.description: The name of this map. usually some identifiying information

map_version.description: Semver version flag for this haptic map. `v{major}.{minor}.{patch}`

author_id.description: Author UUID assigned by the official distribution system. Work in Progress, currently does nothing

custom_repository.description: Custom github repository that will be used to look for newer versions or patches of this map. Only Github pages with default domains are accepted for some semblance of security

index_file.description: URL path from the gh-pages base to your index.json file. URL path must end in index.json

input_nodes.description: Nodes that represent data input FROM the game

output_nodes.description: Nodes that will be associated with an output device. Inidices determine order transmitted to devices, changing the order effectively
